title: The Silent Cherry And Plum Blossoms - Novel Updates
tags: Death of Loved Ones   Depression   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Orphans
author: 一盏夜灯
description:
Tao Anzhi: “Yan Xi, do you love me?”
Yan Xi: “Taotao, of course I love you.”
Tao Anzhi: “Then do you like me?”
Yan Xi: “Taotao… I can’t…”

-----
[Disclaimer: Chapter 13 involves the plot of a child running away from home. If you ever find your children missing, please call the police immediately. Do NOT try to wait 24 hrs before doing so]
